gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 116, Grizzlies 97
gameRecap.excerpt: The Thunder defeated the Grizzlies, 116-97. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander recorded 30 points, nine rebounds and five assists for the Thunder, while Chet Holmgren added 17 points, six rebounds and seven blocks in the victory. Desmond Bane tallied 17 points and four 3PM for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Thunder improve to 17-8 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 6-19.
